titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 338 (which established the Select Committee on Ethics) to change the membership of the select committee from members of the Senate to private citizens.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 338, 88th Congress, to change the membership of the Select Committee on Ethics from Members of the Senate to private citizens. Requires two of such citizens to be retired Federal judges and two to be former Members of the Senate.
